name: Celestial Pathfinder
description:
Hello, and thank you for taking a look at Celestial Pathfinder, the first game by Soda Studios! We hope you enjoy your experience with the game, and we hope to make bigger and better games in the future. Happy Shooting!

-Colin J. Fantry, Project Lead

Controls: Click and Drag to shoot; "R" to reset game (Hint: The little purple things are Power Up's!)

Credits:

Colin Fantry: Project Lead, Lead Designer, All around cool dude

Sean Daniels: Gameplay Engineer, Loud yeller

Nevin Mohr: Lead Programmer, There just after you need him

Nicholas Hollenbeck: Art Man, Music Man, Pretty chill guy 

lukas_Ternelius: Random man I've never met who helped us fix a dumb error we made

Made with Unity

Unity Template we used to help us out: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/packs/space-shooter-free-107260 

Extra Credits: Game Jam hosts, Makers of quality content

Please feel free to email us: sodastudiosdevelopment@gmail.com
